name.description:
Name relative to domain ("endpoint") OR FQDN ("endpoint.example.com").
Server normalizes to relative.
Any change flips status back to pending (worker will UPSERT)

code.description:
A machine-readable error code, e.g. "validation_error"
example: validation_error

message.description:
Human-readable message
example: slug is required

info.description: API for managing K3s clusters across cloud providers
info.title: AutoGlue API

get.description: Returns the JSON Web Key Set for token verification
Returns all admin-configured actions.

post.description: Creates a new admin-configured action.

get.description: Returns a single action.
get.summary: Get a single action by ID

patch.description: Updates an action. Only provided fields are modified.

get.description: Paginated background jobs with optional filters. Search `q` may match id, type, error, payload (implementation-dependent).

parameters.description: Filter by queue name / worker name
parameters.name: queue

post.description: Create a job immediately or schedule it for the future via `run_at`.
Set job status to canceled if cancellable. For running jobs, this only affects future picks; wire to Archer if you need active kill.
Marks the job retriable (DB flip). Swap this for an Archer admin call if you expose one.

get.description: Summary metrics per queue (pending, running, failed, scheduled).
Returns annotations for the organization in X-Org-ID. Filters: `key`, `value`, and `q` (key contains). Add `include=node_pools` to include linked node pools.

post.description: Creates an annotation.

get.description: Returns one annotation. Add `include=node_pools` to include node pools.

post.description: Returns provider authorization URL for the frontend to redirect

get.description: Returns clusters for the organization in X-Org-ID. Filter by `q` (name contains).

post.description: Creates a cluster. Status is managed by the system and starts as `pre_pending` for validation.

delete.description: Deletes the cluster. Related resources are cleaned up via DB constraints (e.g. CASCADE).

get.description: Returns a cluster with all related resources (domain, record set, load balancers, bastion, node pools).
get.summary: Get a single cluster by ID (org scoped)

patch.description: Updates the cluster name, provider, and/or region. Status is managed by the system.

post.description: Creates a ClusterRun record for the cluster/action. Execution is handled asynchronously by workers.
post.summary: Run an admin-configured action on a cluster (org scoped)

delete.summary: Detach the apps load balancer from a cluster

post.description: Sets apps_load_balancer_id on the cluster.

404.description: cluster or load balancer not found

post.summary: Attach an apps load balancer to a cluster

delete.summary: Detach the bastion server from a cluster

post.description: Sets bastion_server_id on the cluster.
post.summary: Attach a bastion server to a cluster

delete.description: Clears captain_domain_id on the cluster. This will likely cause the cluster to become incomplete.
delete.summary: Detach the captain domain from a cluster

post.description: Sets captain_domain_id on the cluster. Validation of shape happens asynchronously.
post.summary: Attach a captain domain to a cluster

delete.summary: Detach the control plane record set from a cluster

post.description: Sets control_plane_record_set_id on the cluster.

404.description: cluster or record set not found

post.summary: Attach a control plane record set to a cluster

delete.summary: Detach the GlueOps/control-plane load balancer from a cluster

post.description: Sets glueops_load_balancer_id on the cluster.

404.description: cluster or load balancer not found

post.summary: Attach a GlueOps/control-plane load balancer to a cluster

delete.description: Removes the encrypted kubeconfig, IV, and tag from the cluster record.
delete.summary: Clear the kubeconfig for a cluster

post.description: Stores the kubeconfig encrypted per organization. The kubeconfig is never returned in responses.
post.summary: Set (or replace) the kubeconfig for a cluster

post.description: Adds an entry in the cluster_node_pools join table.

404.description: cluster or node pool not found

post.summary: Attach a node pool to a cluster

delete.description: Removes an entry from the cluster_node_pools join table.

404.description: cluster or node pool not found

delete.summary: Detach a node pool from a cluster

get.description: Returns runs for a cluster within the organization in X-Org-ID.
Returns a single run for a cluster within the organization in X-Org-ID.
Returns credential metadata for the current org. Secrets are never returned.

patch.summary: Update credential metadata and/or rotate secret

get.description: Returns domains for X-Org-ID. Filters: `domain_name`, `status`, `q` (contains).

parameters.description: Exact domain name (lowercase, no trailing dot)
parameters.name: domain_name

post.description: Creates a domain bound to a Route 53 scoped credential. Archer will backfill ZoneID if omitted.

get.description: Filters: `name`, `type`, `status`.

parameters.description: Exact relative name or FQDN (server normalizes)
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: RR type (A, AAAA, CNAME, TXT, MX, NS, SRV, CAA)
parameters.name: type

get.summary: List record sets for a domain

post.summary: Create a record set (pending; Archer will UPSERT to Route 53)

delete.summary: Delete a record set (API removes row; worker can optionally handle external deletion policy)

patch.summary: Update a record set (flips to pending for reconciliation)

get.description: Returns 200 OK when the service is up
Returns node labels for the organization in X-Org-ID. Filters: `key`, `value`, and `q` (key contains). Add `include=node_pools` to include linked node groups.

post.description: Creates a label.

400.description: invalid json / missing fields / invalid node_pool_ids

get.description: Returns one label.
Returns load balancers for the organization in X-Org-ID.
Returns load balancer for the organization in X-Org-ID.

post.description: Returns the plaintext key once. Store it securely on the client side.
post.summary: Create a new user API key

get.description: Returns node pools for the organization in X-Org-ID.

post.description: Creates a node pool. Optionally attach initial servers.

400.description: invalid json / missing fields / invalid server_ids

get.description: Returns one node pool. Add `include=servers` to include servers.
get.summary: Get node pool by ID (org scoped)
List annotations attached to a node pool (org scoped)

post.summary: Attach annotation to a node pool (org scoped)

delete.summary: Detach one annotation from a node pool (org scoped)

get.summary: List labels attached to a node pool (org scoped)

post.summary: Attach labels to a node pool (org scoped)

delete.summary: Detach one label from a node pool (org scoped)

get.summary: List servers attached to a node pool (org scoped)

post.summary: Attach servers to a node pool (org scoped)

delete.summary: Detach one server from a node pool (org scoped)

get.summary: List taints attached to a node pool (org scoped)

post.summary: Attach taints to a node pool (org scoped)

delete.summary: Detach one taint from a node pool (org scoped)

get.description: Returns servers for the organization in X-Org-ID. Optional filters: status, role.

post.description: Creates a server bound to the org in X-Org-ID. Validates that ssh_key_id belongs to the org.

400.description: invalid json / missing fields / invalid status / invalid ssh_key_id

get.description: Returns one server in the given organization.

patch.description: Partially update fields; changing ssh_key_id validates ownership.

400.description: invalid id / invalid json / invalid status / invalid ssh_key_id

post.description: Clears the stored SSH host key for this server. The next SSH connection will re-learn the host key (trust-on-first-use).

get.description: Returns ssh keys for the organization in X-Org-ID.

post.description: Generates an RSA or ED25519 keypair, saves it, and returns metadata. For RSA you may set bits (2048/3072/4096). Default is 4096. ED25519 ignores bits.

get.description: Returns public key fields. Append `?reveal=true` to include the private key PEM.
get.summary: Get ssh key by ID (org scoped)

get.description: Download `part=public|private|both` of the keypair. `both` returns a zip file.
get.summary: Download ssh key files by ID (org scoped)

get.description: Returns node taints for the organization in X-Org-ID. Filters: `key`, `value`, and `q` (key contains). Add `include=node_pools` to include linked node pools.

post.description: Creates a taint.

400.description: invalid json / missing fields / invalid node_pool_ids

get.summary: Get node taint by ID (org scoped)

get.description: Returns build/runtime metadata for the running service.
